bulletPoints.text: Architected and led the development of a platform utilized by 800+ users, implementing key features such as
subPoints: Multi-type wallet system for financial transactions

bulletPoints: Collaborated with cross-functional teams to implement new features and improve user experience.
Optimized application performance and ensured cross-browser compatibility.
Implemented and maintained RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express.
Led cost-saving initiatives by migrating MySQL 5.7 to MySQL 8 on AWS RDS, resulting in a 20% reduction in costs.
Updated deployment pipelines to support blue/green deployments, ensuring zero downtime during updates.
Resolved legacy bugs affecting client operations and improved environment setups.
Managed development cycles and deployment processes for new features.
Built an admin dashboard and executed SQL migrations and triggers using Vue.js

subPoints: Architected a microservice-based lead capture application.
Managed a team of developers to deliver a scalable web builder solution, enabling users to create customizable forms using React and Tailwind CSS.
Developed a platform enabling 5,000+ users to track and follow their favorite Spanish athletes during the Tokyo Olympic Games, facilitating over 50,000 interactions.
Created reusable components for forms and quizzes, deployed on client websites with an estimated 5 million views.
Created multiple portfolio websites for clients, showcasing their work and services.
Created multiple Shopify websites for clients, integrating payment gateways and customizing themes.
Automated tasks for multiple clients using multiple languages
Clients include multiple "Afiliate Marketing" companies multiple Real State agencies such as Tecnocasa
